question: Mufti saheb can you please list for me the fard of salaah according to each of the four mathabs. Jazakallah khairan
answer:
QUESTION
If you could also mention any books for the maliki fiqh that contain masail of ibaadat (similar to bahisthi zewar)
ANSWER


Share:
FARAA-IDH OF SALAAT
1. Takbeer-e-Tahreema
2. Qiyaam (standing) position
3. Qiraat (recitation of at least three Aayaats or one long aayat of the Qur'aan)
4. Ruku (to bow down).
5. Both the Sajdahs (to prostrate)
6. Qa'dah Akheera (To sit so long at the end of the last Rakaat that one can read the Tashahhud

Ta'leemul Haqq
